channel.title: david_blumenthal on Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content in david_blumenthal on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: In October 2019, I will join the Chair of Experimental Bioinformatics at TU Munich as a postdoctoral researcher. My main focus will be to apply techniques from combinatorial optimization and graph theory to address problems in network biology and systems medicine. From 2007 to 2015, I studied Mathematics and Philosophy at FU Berlin and TU Berlin and received Masterâ€™s degrees in both disciplines. After that, I did a Ph.D. in Computer Science at the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano, Italy.
